Class FornitureControllerSingleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • gameshop.advance.controller.FornitureControllerSingleton
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRemoteFornitureClient, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class FornitureControllerSingleton
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements IRemoteFornitureClient
    Controller che gestisce tutte le operazioni riguardanti la gestione delle forniture.
